messages.messageBody:
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com/28036.html

go ahead and friend the youtube account

for now there is one vid up and all the "friends" listed have
Shinsengumi or Bakumatsu related media

in the future alot of media linked on the Makoto Film Dojo
(including things from slide shows to audio fics, visual fics and
independent fan movies) will have files hosted on youtube and links to
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/mfd.html (this page is currently offline
for tech related magical maintenance I don't understand)
